products.title: LG WM2450HRA
products.description:
The LG WM2450HRA is a low-end to mid-range front-load washer with Energy Star certification. It features a 3.7 cu. ft. drum, TrueSteam technology, ColdWash technology and a Direct Drive Motor. Additionally, the WM2450HRA sports an Allergiene cycle, 6Motion wash technology, TrueBalance anti-vibration technology and a SpeedWash cycle for smaller, less dirty loads.

The WM2450HRA's TrueSteam technology utilizes a real steam generator which produces hotter and smaller particles of steam than washers with less ideal steam solutions into fabrics for a gentle, powerful clean. Its ColdWash technology allows the WM2450HRA to provide a more effective cold wash clean by way of enhanced drum motions. Meanwhile, the WM2450HRA's Direct Drive Motor ensures greater durability and consistency as it contains fewer moving parts than typical washer motors for greater efficiency.

Features

  • 3.7 cu. ft. drum
  • TrueSteam technology
  • ColdWash technology
  • Direct Drive Motor
  • Allergiene cycle
  • 6Motion wash technology
  • TrueBalance anti-vibration technology
  • SpeedWash cycle
  • Warranty: 1 Year Parts and Labor, 10 Years Motor, Lifetime on Drum
  • Energy Star certified

pros.text: Reasonably priced for the size and features.
Sleek visual aesthetic with an attractive red finish.
SpeedWash cycle is great for small, quick loads.
Excellent warranty coverage (1 Year Parts and Labor, 10 Years Motor, Lifetime on Drum).
Allergiene cycle is pretty effective at eliminating allergens.

cons.text: Not as energy efficient as comparable washers in this class.
TrueSteam technology works pretty well but some pretreating is still required to get rid of some stains.
